Title: SharpCopy
Description: SharpCopy is simple, keyboard controlled utility tool, it helps to store 10 copied texts at the same time, and restore then to the clipboard when needed.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

CopySharp is a simple clipboard app that allows you to copy multiple Text and restore them to the Clipboard when needed.

Note: This app does not alter or modify the standard Control + C / Control + V, it just expand it with more features that are optional to use.

How to use:

Control + [0-9] + C - Will copy the text and store it in the specified Key.
Example: Control + 7 + C, will store the text in the key 7.

Control + [0-9] - Will restore the Text stored in the Key pressed to the Clipboard, ready to be pasted using Control + V
Example: Control + 7 followed by Control +V
